response.original_title: Người Đàn Bà Không Hóa Đá
response.overview: A film about women in the town waiting for her husband coming back after the war. She was a good wife and daughter. She always waited and looked for his husband. Besides, she took care of his parent and their daughter. After tens of years without any news about her husband, she decided to give herself a chance to be loved. At the same time, she heard her husband was living. She must to give her own decision for her life.
response.title: Người Đàn Bà Không Hóa Đá
